home.heroSubtitle: In an ocean of digital noise,Veritas Vision is your anchor for truth.Our essential AI-powered toolkit empowers you to critically analyze news,video, and audio content, navigating the online world with clarity and confidence.
home.heroSubtitle2: Detect deepfakes, altered images, and synthetic audio with our powerful tools.
home.heroSubtitle3: Empowering you to distinguish fact from fiction in the digital world.

features.title: News Sleuth
features.description: Analyze news articles, headlines, or URLs to uncover biases, check facts, and assess overall credibility. News Sleuth cross-references claims with reputable sources to give you a detailed report.
featureList: Detection of sensationalism and logical fallacies
Identification of political, ideological, or commercial biases

features.title: Video Integrity
features.description: Scrutinize videos for signs of deepfakery, manipulation, and synthetic content. Our tool performs a multi-modal analysis of video and audio tracks to ensure what you're seeing is real.
featureList: Analysis of video edits, CGI, and temporal inconsistencies
Voice cloning and synthetic audio detection

features.title: Audio Authenticator
features.description: Verify the authenticity of audio recordings. This tool detects AI-generated speech, voice cloning, and other manipulations by analyzing vocal patterns, background noise, and digital fingerprints.
featureList: Voice cloning and AI speech synthesis detection
Analysis of tonal and cadence inconsistencies

features.title: Image Verifier
features.description: Examine images for signs of AI generation or digital tampering. The Image Verifier uses forensic analysis to spot artifacts, inconsistencies, and check the image's origin and context.
featureList: Detection of Photoshop and other manipulation techniques
Reverse image search for contextual analysis
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and text analysis
